title: The Elektra Collection [REMIX] (1981-2010|Dgtl+S|Emp+MM+DCP+)
description:
For more information about this character, please see the wikilink here: <a href="
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elektra_(comics)" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elektra_(comics)</a>

Elektra Natchios was created by Frank Miller during his first celebrated run on Daredevil in 1982; She was killed as a character shortly after in a shocking move at the time, especially for Marvel Comics and still during the era of the Comics Code Authority. However, it seems she just can't stay dead, and Miller himself (despite a complicated relationship with the character) as well as others have resurrected her from time to time. She has proven quite popular over the years and has had an ongoing series twice as well as her own feature film, subsequent to her appearance in the Daredevil movie. This torrent collects the first major arc of her character and nearly all of her appearances in one-shots, minis, and TPBs over the years. Her later appearances in Daredevil, Thunderbolts and other regular titles such as Wolverine are not featured. Included are the following:

*NOTE - for TPB users, I have posted this collection before, but this is updated with several better versions of the various releases and extra material not in the original, hence the REMIX tag. I also removed the reprint series after deeming them superfluous. I will note all the changes and scanners below where appropriate.

-Frank Miller Classics, which contains Daredevil Visionaries - Frank Miller, Volume 2 + Volume 3 (1981-1983) - The first appearance of Elektra and her first major storylines as well. Also - Elektra Lives Again original graphic novel (Marvel Comics / Epic Comics, 1990)
-Elektra: Assassin #1-8 (Marvel Comics, 1986, with Bill Sienkewicz)
-Elektra: Root of Evil #1-4 (Marvel Comics, 1995)
-Elektra vol. 1, #1-19 (Marvel Comics, 1996ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡ÃƒÂ´1998)
-Elektra vol. 1, #-1 (Marvel Comics, 1997, "FlashBack Month" issue)
-Elektra vol. 2, #1-35 (Marvel Comics / Marvel Knights, 2001-2004)
-Elektra and Wolverine: The Redeemer #1-3 (Marvel Comics, 2002)
-Elektra: Glimpse & Echo #1-4 (Marvel Comics / Marvel Knights, 2002)
-Dark Reign: Elektra #1-5 (Marvel Comics, 2009)
-Ultimate Daredevil and Elektra #1-4 (Marvel Comics, 2002)
-Ultimate Elektra #1-5 (Marvel Comics, 2004)
-Elektra: The Hand #1-5 (2004-2005)

---Various One-Shots and Singles, which contains the following:
-Elektra / Cyblade one-shot (Marvel Comics / Top Cow Productions, 1997)
-Witchblade / Elektra one-shot (Top Cow Productions / Marvel Comics, 1997)
-Peter Parker: Spider-Man / Elektra '98 Annual (Marvel Comics, 1998)
-Elektra Battlebook - Streets Of Fire (1998) (Sepi-Scan)
-Shadowland: Elektra one-shot (Marvel Comics, 2010)
-The Punisher v6 027 (story titled "Elektra")
-What If Daredevil vs. Elektra 001 (2010) (Digital) (Cypher-Empire)
-What If v1 035 - Elektra Had Lived (1982)

As to sources, the following are the notable ones and upgrades from previous versions of this collection. The Dark Reign is by Minutemen scanners + Issue 05 by Ven. The Frank Miller Visionaries editions are by Blastarr and Blasty-DCP. The two Ultimate Universe minis are both Digital by AnHeroGold-Empire. As noted in their titles, the Shadowland one-shot is by Minutemen and the What If 2010 issue is Digital by Cypher-Empire (other versions exist but that is the best one IMHO). Thanks a lot to all the scanner groups for this collection - please seed, and enjoy! :-)
